title: Improve Polly system prompt and add auto-deploy
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: Polly receives a system prompt tune-up for more concise answers alongside a new auto-deployment workflow.
gist.impact: Users will notice snappier, more focused responses from the assistant while maintaining its friendly personality.
gist.visual_concept: Polly (represented as a cute pixel art parrot) holding a streamlined script or speech bubble. The Pollinations bee is assisting, perhaps adjusting a microphone or giving a thumbs up. Represents 'conciseness' and 'tuning'.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute 8-bit parrot character holding a streamlined script, with the Pollinations bee mascot adjusting a microphone nearby. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Represents concise AI communication. Nostalgic but beautiful.
